Reviews.Title: pretty decent, with a couple of comments
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "-Jon"
Reviews.Content: well, they look fairly convincing, I think, if mounted high enough not to be looked at too closely. They DO have a blinking red LED which comes on when it gets dark (photocell controlled) and the LED is VERY bright. Just put them up so I have no idea how long the batteries will last, but if I'd designed them I'd make the LED flash a much shorter flash, and less frequently. You can always turn off the LED, too, with the switch, to make them look like the other (real) cameras. there's some limits on how they can be positioned, too, but will probably work for the majority of situations. just be careful tightening the screws- use a power drill like I did and *snap* goes the plastic... time for a longer screw and big washer... be sure to peel off the giant white "made in china" sticker from the base!

ProductInfo.Features:
High-quality, well-designed and easy-installed security cameras at affordable price. Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real cameras
Looks extremely realistic with the fake lens, dummy IR illuminators in real camera housing
Built-in light sensor will turn on flash light at night automatically. A power switch can shut off flash light when you need
Adjustable swivel mount for easy installation. Can be mounted to the wall or ceiling
The camera requires 2 of 1.5V AAA batteries (Not Included). Each camera includes a security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 3 Pack Dummy Bullet Security Cameras Fake Infrared LEDs with Flashing Light Home CCTV Surveillance C94
